title: Krak Session – Rodin Skatepark
content:
We met with the guys from Balargue skateshop to skate their local park: Rodin skatepark.

The skatepark is really fun, smooth concrete in a small suburban park.

Join us on Krakito to be a part of such sessions, and check our Krak app for the localisation of such spots/park.

Enjoy!
author: thomas
video: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W_EBnirqqJ4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
